pages.title: Upgrading Your Heaters
pages.text: As the cold intensifies, basic heaters won't cut it. Surround a $(l:heating/thermal_heater)Thermal Heater$(/l) with materials to create upgraded versions:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Iron:$() +50°C, 9-block radius, 1.5x fuel$(li)$(bold)Gold:$() +65°C, 11-block radius, 2x fuel$(li)$(bold)Diamond:$() +80°C, 14-block radius, 3x fuel$(br2)$(bold)Warning:$() In Phase 4+, fuel burns faster (2x/4x/8x by phase). Budget accordingly.

pages.title: Shelter & Strategy
pages.text: $(bold)Shelter matters:$() In Phase 5+, exposed heaters lose half their radius. Enclose all 6 faces with solid blocks to maintain full range.$(br2)$(italic)"Can I just build 30 basic heaters?" You can. You'll also need 30 coal per minute. ORSA calls this the "bonfire strategy." It works until it doesn't.$()

pages.title: Iron Thermal Heater
pages.text: Surround a Thermal Heater with 8 iron ingots. A solid upgrade for Phase 3-4. The heater gets warmer and hungrier. Like Kevin at a buffet.

pages.title: Gold Thermal Heater
pages.text: Surround a Thermal Heater with 8 gold ingots. Extended range helps cover larger bases.

pages.title: Diamond Thermal Heater
pages.text: 8 diamonds on a heater. Massive range, 3x fuel burn. ORSA Engineering has never heard of the word "affordable."
